root: ^player: I just ran into more of those things… what are they
^friend: I don't know, they look like zombies but who knows
^player: jesus, theres more of them coming darkness eating zombies
^player: the darkness… it's eating the zombie
^friend: don't let it reach you, keep moving
^player: I won't… whats the situation on your end?
^friend: hey it looks like I've reached a deadend… it looks like there are two paths but they're both blocked by something
^friend: I found a note that says you can open one of the paths for me
^friend: not exactly, but it does say you have a choice…
^friend: make sure you open the green door
^player: green door? Okay got it, I'll take a look around and see what I can find
^You find two levers and have to choose which one to switch
^you can see behind one door is more resources/enemies….
